TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Maithripala_Sirisena, title = Maithripala_Sirisena, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Maithripala_Sirisena} }

S.FORM: I 1951 a miheca saka 9 folad saka 3 a romi'ad masofoc ci Maithripala Sirisena , malamikomoday a tamdaw. O Sawara'an no kitakit no Sri lanka anini i ci Maithripala Sirisena, patirengan a romi'ad i 2015 a miheca saka 1 folad saka 9 a romi'ad.
